text: Jonathan Edwards (October 5, 1703 â€“ March 22, 1758) was a colonial American preacher, theologian, and missionary to Native Americans. He was one of the most important people in the Great Awakening, a religious movement in the United States. He preached a sermon called "Sinners in the Hands of an Angry God". title: Jonathan Edwards (theologian)
